DIALOGUE_TEXT: I... I think we lost them...
We should... We should keep moving.
If they find us...
We won't come back there.
But let's get a rest. You all are exhausted.
Why... Why aren't you so tired...?
Foolish question.. He's a predator, that's why...
Lucky guy...
So... what we do now?
Those humans from the zoo are still looking for us...
We can't stay here.
Agreed. We have to move.
Let's go to the mountains, we can hide there!
You fool, there is the first place they're gonna look after us!
Oh, so you have a better idea, mister meat-eating?
Does my diet matter something here, lizard?
Wohoo, fight, fight, fight!
Please, don't start fighting... we have to work togeth--
Shut up, weakling! Just stay out of this!
B-But...
W-Waaaah!
For bamboo's sake... keep your kid quiet!
They are going to hear us, you dumb marsupial!
I-I'm sorry...! Shh, shh, please, stay quiet sweety...
S-Sniff...
Jeez, it would have been better not bringing the baby with us...
Don't you DARE saying that again, you cold lizard!
A HUMAN! MAYDAY, MAYDAY!
Damn... our luck only gets worse...
We have to run! Escape, escape!
NO! IF IT RUNS AWAY, IT WILL TELL THEM WHERE WE ARE!
LET'S HUNT THE HUMAN!
A-Are you even listening to yourselves?
... *Growls*
... [stay silent]
Hello?
Please, don't hurt me!
Don't talk, human! We know your intentions!
No one will fool us again!
Maybe you should calm down first, Panda.
Yeah, there's no point in screaming and scaring the human.
I don't want that fleeing and warning others of its own.
Please, stop fighting... let's talk...
Woah, woah! Relax, human!
No one is going to hurt you, kiddo.
Speak for yourselves, traitors.
No human can be trusted. He's a threat!
Why are you fighting?
You are scaring me...
Hey, I'm a good kid!
Why are you mad at me?
Because all of your type are slavers and barbarians!
Panda! Just shut up, it's just a kid!
Yeah, the worst kind of human!
We have to get rid of it right now!
Weird assumption coming from one of the species that had us as their slaves.
But it's kinda funny, he looks... too small?
Because it's a child, you rude people!
FOR THE BAMBOO'S SAKE, FOCUS ON THE MAIN POINT!
HE'S A THREAT, A BARBARIAN!
WE HAVE TO GET RID OF IT!
*sigh* Dude, just shut up, please.
You are being very rude...
Believe me, I don't want problems...
See? No words! I was right about it's guilt!
I think you are just being too abrassive.
The human can't even talk with so much blabbering of yours.
Hey, human! Answer something!
Are you going to be a threat to us?
See!?
Huh, sketchy.
Yyyyeh human, at least give us something to work.
We can't trust humans! Specialy little demons like you!
Panda, that's enough. The kid is clearly no threat to us.
Yeah. Just shut up already.
B-But...!
Before anyone decides anything, there is something I want to know.
What are you doing here, if you aren't spying on us?
I just got lost...
I don't have to answer you!
EXCUSE ME!?
Hah, a little cheeky, don't you?
Well, the human just pointed the facts.
Becausen you are being rude.
I'm sorry, I'm scared!
Yeah. Tucan is right!
Oh, poor kid...
Don't worry. Nothing is going to happen.
Well, first control the paranoid racoon here.
He looks like a volcano about to explode.
HEY!
I didn't need your agreement, human.
But thanks!
That's all we need, someone telling the tucan he was right...
Hey! what do you mean by that, huh!?
... [remain silent]
Nope, not saying to you!
This is riddiculous!
Agreed. But I didn't expect too much from it to be honest.
You both are just morons, right?
EXCUSE ME!?
H-Hello...?
Why are you saluting the human!?
I-I don't know... Education...?
But it's a H U M A N!
Yeah, we have eyes to see it, genious.
Sarcasm doesn't fit you well, sweetheart.
Ouch, Chamie 1, Linx 0.
I don't like any of you, except from the Koala guy.
Well, at least we share something in common then.
GUYS, THERE'S A HUMAN THERE!
Can you, I don't know...
PAY ATTENTION FOR ONCE AT LEAST!?
Hey bro, chill. The kid is not moving.
Maybe it's dead or something.
Don't make that kind of jokes, for eucalyptus sake!
Why~? We have a human lover here~?
D-Don't be silly!
Huh... is he being silly, or just accurate?
Hey, let him alone. He did nothing to you.
Now defending the human lover? You, the meat-eater?
Don't push it, lizard.
Or what are you going to do?
Eat me, maybe? Hunt me?
You are pissing me--
PLEASE, STOP, ALL OF YOU!
Tsk...
Not very talkative, don'tcha?
However... let's stop wasting time fighting.
Threat or not, we are now in a dead point.
So... what do we do now?
It's already very dark, and the child doesn't seem dangerous.
Maybe we should rest...
Yeah. Fighting won't solve anything.
But... what about the human?
We can't just... keep it here.
I'll be good!
I'm leaving.
But we can't just throw the kid into the forest!
Could be dangerous!
...Aaand? I particulary don't care if it get's hurt or something.
What a friendly guy.
*sigh* Just keep an eye on him. We'll see tomorrow.
You CAN'T be serious!
Panda, shut up. It's pointless.
You all are desillusional!
We will regret this!
Fine. The kid stays.
Thanks God...
But just for this night. We don't trust you yet.
Yup. Not a single bit.
You all will regret this. Remember my words.
What, wait! No!
You can't be serious...
I TOLD YOU! HE'S GOING TO SELL US TO THE HUMANS!
Eh, maybe you are overreacting, Panda.
But yeah, kiddo, you can't go back.
We don't trust you. So, we can't let you go just like that.
Not yet at least.
Come on guys...
Hey, little child. Just stay here this night.
It's dangerous outside in the woods.
Tomorrow we'll see what to do, right?
Don't be afraid, I won't allow them to touch you.
*murmuring* As if you could...
Well... it seems to be decided.
The human stays whatever it wants or not.
Oooh, the little human is bored?
Too bad talking to you makes me lazy.
Sorry, human. Not in the mood for a chat
Stay away from me, you freak.
Why do you even bother talking to me?
Oh, kid! Good morning.
Did you sleep well?
Yup! Slept like a baby!
I had nightmares...
Uhm... are you alright?
You are too quiet...
It's really good to hear that!
Oh... I'm sorry to hear that...
You need a bit more of rest?
I hope we didn't scare you too much yesterday.
We were all a little shaken. Sorry about that...
I'm OK.
Don't worry!
You were mean
Oh... Sorry about that too...
Some of us never had good experiences with humans.
But I want to try to see people for what they are.
Instead of judging them for how they look.
... Alriiight...,
Glad to hear that, kid.
But I do! A good sleep is necessary!
People need to have healthy sleep habits.
It doesn't matter what species it belongs to.
I see, good!
I don't care.
... I was trying to be kind.
You don't need to be so gruff ...
Yup! I hope we get along, kiddo!
However, my name is Gus and this is my daughter, Fae.
Nice to meet you...?
$playerName, right?
Sounds cool!
Thank you!
Yeah, whatever.
Uh... well...
What a polite child...!
You're welcome!
Uhm, sorry if the comment made you unconfortable...
Hey, calm down a bit, will you?
I try to be nice, but if you continue like this, I will stop.
Think about it.
Excuse me, but I have to take care of Fae.
It's been a pleasure talking to you, $playerName.
Have a good day, $playerName.
Good afternoon, $playerName!
Maybe later you can play with Fae?
She needs to socialize and improve her own confidece.
Good afternoon, $playerName.
Try not crossing with Panda, he's irritable.
Hi.
Now I'm busy, sorry
You are still not trustworthy.
We will handle this situation.
I have all under control.
Order is essential.
So a kid doesn't belong here.
Human stupidity is infinite.
Afternoon!
I don't recomend you to talk with the crazy Panda.
Instead talk with me! We can make some jokes.
I don't like responsabilities.
So if something happens to you, go talk with Lynx or Koala
Boooring.
Good afternoon.
If Panda just messes up with you, let me know kiddo.
Don't look me like that.
I'm not gonna eat you.
Mind your own business.
Are you hungry?
*Stomach growling*
S-Stay away from me.
You know the basics of a conversation is talking, don't you?
Haha. I'll take that as a 'yes, sir'.
Heh, another one.
Just because I'm a lynx doesn't mean I'm going to eat you.
So relax, human.
You prefer meat, or veggies?
I've never seen a lynx before.
I don't believe you!
Well, there is nothing surprising in being one..
We eat, sleep, talk and work like any other being.
Surprising, isn't it?
Then good luck finding food by yourself.
How rude.
I don't want to be a burden...
Whataver you want.
*sigh* Well silent kid, you will see.
You won't. You're just a child.
An adult has to take care of you.
Heh, you're starting to sound like the red racoon there.
But maybe you should start thinking before talking like that.
Koala may have patience. I don't.
Makes sense, you are like me!
But you eat people!
Haha! You really are something else, huh?
Nevermind. I won't lose time with a rude human.
Get out of my sight.
Here, take the food.
Leave me alone for a while, please.
I need to think...
YOU WANNA FIGHT?!
Stay away from me.
I'm talking seriously, don't make me say it twice.
All humans are the same.
Stay away from me.
Why are you still here!?
I wanted to know you better...
Why are you so rude to me?
STOP STARING AT ME LIKE THAT, YOU CREEP!
... Are you stupid or something?
Why would I want to speak to a barbarian like you?
I beg you pardon?
Rude? To you? Are you serious?
I'm just being cautious! We can't trust you humans!
Can I be your friend?
Are you a racoon?
Because I wanna be your friend.
I did nothing to you.
But I did nothing to you...
You are jelous that I'm human.
PFFFT!! HAHAHAHA!
Me? Jelaous? Of you? Why on earth I would?
Sorry, that was mean of me.
Because you're a racoon.
At least you are aware of it. Good.
Now, can you leave me alone?
You know what? That's all.
Get out of my sight. Now.
Or I will bite you. Or punch you,
Stupid human.
I don't want to be friends of you.
No human can be trusted.
Specially you, the small ones.
You're the worst. You are cruel.
Well, maybe not you. That's true.
But you humans have a long history.
Specially those coming to that Zoo.
You were terrible living beings.
Can we be friends?
[leaves]
But we all are not the same.
You are being dramatic.
Maybe you are genuinely stupid after all.
LEAVE. ME. ALOOOOONE.
Well. Maybe you are right. Who knows.
Just... let me rest. I have to think.
*sight* Just let me be. I don't wanna talk.
